#  Introduction to Meetings and Group

## Format


This is the first meeting. We will meet as a large group and discuss the format for this time. During this time we will consider:

- What is a thesis/project?
- What we will do through the rest of the meetings.
- Address any and all questions regarding thesis
 

## Group Discussion

The rest of the time available will be informal discussions. Student's can ask about the upcoming semesters, information on courses, etc...
